history.changes:
Buy value: From: 10 launcher ammo for 6,000 Coins To: 6 launcher ammo for 4,500 Coins Sell value: 200 Coins  250 Coins
From: 10 launcher ammo for 6,000 Coins
To: 6 launcher ammo for 4,500 Coins
Sell value: 200 Coins  250 Coins
Crafting: From: 6 launcher ammo for 4 Metal parts + 1 Explosive Compound To: 6 launcher ammo for 1 ARC Motion Core + 2 Crude Explosives
From: 6 launcher ammo for 4 Metal parts + 1 Explosive Compound
To: 6 launcher ammo for 1 ARC Motion Core + 2 Crude Explosives
Launcher ammo crafting is available at the Workbench without needing a blueprint.

Value: 100 Coins  200 Coins (this doubles trader cost for launcher ammo)
Crafting (6 ammo): From: 5 Metal Parts + 1 Crude Explosives To: 4 Metal Parts + 1 Explosive Compound
From: 5 Metal Parts + 1 Crude Explosives
To: 4 Metal Parts + 1 Explosive Compound
